# Frequently Asked Questions

I submitted a tool and it hasn't been approved yet. When will my tool go live?

It's been over a week since I submitted my tool? Why didn't it get approved?

What are featured listings? How do I feature my tool?

I want to update information about my tool. How do I do that?

I want to sponsor Matt Wolfe's YouTube channel or Newsletter. How do I do that?

How does this site make money?

How can I get in contact with Matt?

What is news.futuretools.com?
